basic.name: Healing Brew (Q)
basic.description: Heal the lowest Health allied Hero within 6 range for 175 Health.

basic.name: Cloud Serpent (W)
basic.description: Summon a Cloud Serpent on an allied Hero that attacks nearby enemies every second. Each attack deals 26 damage and heals the ally for 20. Lasts for 8 seconds.

basic.name: Blinding Wind (E)
basic.description: Throw a cloud of wind at the 2 nearest enemies (prioritizing Heroes), dealing 133 damage. Heroes hit are Blinded and Slowed by 15% for 1.5 seconds.

heroic.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups (R)
heroic.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 75 Health.

heroic.name: Water Dragon (R)
heroic.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Fast Feet (T)
trait.description: Upon taking damage, your Basic Ability cooldowns refresh 50% faster and you gain 10% Movement Speed for 1 second.

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Serpent Sidekick
1.description: Cloud Serpent no longer costs Mana and while Fast Feet is active its cooldown refreshes an additional 75% faster.

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 150% and increase Mana regeneration by 150% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Wind Serpent
4.description: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased Movement Speed. Casting Blinding Wind increases this bonus to 20% for 3 seconds. Passive: Cloud Serpent attacks 25% faster.

4.name: Surging Winds
4.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet, 30 Armor, and 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.Passive: While Fast Feet is active, Li Li gains 10 Armor.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Mass Vortex
7.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 160 and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 75 Health.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Lightning Serpent
13.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional targets for 13 damage and 10 healing.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's Blind duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 100% increased damage.

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's Slow amount to 30% and its duration to 2 seconds.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu’lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent grants its bearer 10% increased healing received and heals them for an additional 0.5% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149. Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Gain 35 Armor while Stunned, Silenced, or Rooted.Passive: Increase Fast Feet's cooldown refresh rate to 75%
